channel.title: Error

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:10, topic:325787”][code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String titles = “”;
switch(playerRights) {
case 1:
titles = "Moderator: ";
break;

		case 2:
			titles = "Administrator: ";
		break;

		case 3:
			titles = "Owner: ";
		break;
	}
	yell(playerName+", " +titles+": " + command.substring(5));
}[/code][/quote]

if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String[] rights = { "Moderator","Administrator","Owner" }; String msg = command.substring(5); yell(rights[playerRights]+" "+playerName+": "+msg); }

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Alright, I added that and didn’t find any errors, I’ll let you know how it works in game after someone helps me with another problem. I tried making it that if your login=10, meaning you’ve already logged in, it says Welcome back, instead of welcome.

This is my code;

sM("Welcome to * Beta!"); if (firstlogin = 10); sM("Welcome back to * Beta!");

And these are the errors;

client.java:9725: incompatible types found : int required: boolean if (firstlogin = 10); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[PLAYER] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "[MOD] ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[HIGH-ADMIN] ";
break;

case 4:
titles = "[SERVER] ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}[/code]
Try this ?

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Can someone tell me what I did wrong? I was converting the PvP titles to staff ranks, got some errors. Any help is appreciated.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 10) String titles = ""; { if (playerRights <= 1) { titles = "Moderator: "; } if (playerRights <= 2) { titles = "Administrator: "; } if (playerRights <= 3) { titles = "Owner: "; } { yell(playerName+", " +titles+": " + command.substring(5)); } }

Read full topic
